data.name: Interwoven
data.detailed_description:
Can you reach the top?


After discovering that local legend is more than mere fiction, your party must scale Anvite Mountain to expel the irascible Obsidian Drake. Forge enchanted weapons, meet new friends, and explore the mountainside region on your way to the peak!

Your imagination's the limit with the Augment Battle System
In the Augment Battle System, each character can act twice per turn. Each character first selects a basic Action. Then, characters can bind Augments to any of those Actions to apply powerful modifiers and effects to those moves. Experiment with countless Action-Augment combos to blow away your foes!

A bite-sized JRPG
Interwoven crafts a tight-knit experience, developing combat and story at a steady pace along its streamlined world map. Enjoy a full adventure packed with expressive characters, strategic combat, vibrant music, and more in less than 10 hours!

data.short_description: Welcome to Interwoven - a bite-sized adventure inspired by traditional turn-based JRPGs. Follow an unlikely trio on their journey to defeat the Obsidian Drake atop Anvite Mountain. Weave together dynamic strategies with the game’s unique Augment Battle System and carve your own path to victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i5 2.4GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX750 or higher, AMD Radeon™ R7 260X or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX970 or higher AMD Radeon™ RX 480 or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
